statements.statement: CREATE PRIMARY INDEX def_sample_airport_primary ON `@BUCKET_NAME@`.sample.airport USING GSI WITH {"defer_build":true}
CREATE INDEX def_name_type on `@BUCKET_NAME@`(name) WHERE _type='User' USING GSI WITH {"defer_build":true}
CREATE INDEX def_faa ON `@BUCKET_NAME@`(faa) USING GSI WITH {"defer_build":true}
CREATE INDEX def_icao ON `@BUCKET_NAME@`(icao) USING GSI WITH {"defer_build":true}
CREATE INDEX def_city ON `@BUCKET_NAME@`(city) USING GSI WITH {"defer_build":true}
CREATE INDEX def_airportname ON `@BUCKET_NAME@`(airportname) USING GSI WITH {"defer_build":true}
CREATE INDEX def_type ON `@BUCKET_NAME@`(type) USING GSI WITH {"defer_build":true}
CREATE INDEX def_sourceairport ON `@BUCKET_NAME@`(sourceairport) USING GSI WITH {"defer_build":true}
CREATE INDEX def_schedule_utc on `@BUCKET_NAME@`(ARRAY s.utc FOR s IN schedule END) USING GSI WITH {"defer_build":true}
CREATE INDEX def_route_src_dst_day ON `@BUCKET_NAME@` (sourceairport, destinationairport, DISTINCT ARRAY v.day FOR v IN schedule END) WHERE type='route' USING GSI WITH {"defer_build":true}
CREATE INDEX `def_sample_airport_airportname` ON `@BUCKET_NAME@`.sample.airport(airportname)  USING GSI WITH {"defer_build":true}
CREATE INDEX `def_sample_landmark_city` ON `@BUCKET_NAME@`.sample.landmark(`city`) USING GSI WITH {"defer_build":true}
CREATE INDEX `def_sample_hotel_city` ON `@BUCKET_NAME@`.sample.hotel(`city`) USING GSI WITH {"defer_build":true}
CREATE INDEX `def_sample_airport_city` ON `@BUCKET_NAME@`.sample.airport(`city`) USING GSI WITH {"defer_build":true}
CREATE INDEX `def_sample_airport_faa` ON `@BUCKET_NAME@`.sample.airport(`faa`) USING GSI WITH {"defer_build":true}

CREATE INDEX `def_sample_route_route_src_dst_day` ON `@BUCKET_NAME@`.sample.route(`sourceairport`,`destinationairport`,(distinct (array (`v`.`day`) for `v` in `schedule` end))) USING GSI WITH {"defer_build":true}
CREATE INDEX `def_sample_route_schedule_utc` ON `@BUCKET_NAME@`.sample.route(array (`s`.`utc`) for `s` in `schedule` end) USING GSI WITH {"defer_build":true}
CREATE INDEX `def_sample_route_sourceairport` ON `@BUCKET_NAME@`.sample.route(`sourceairport`) USING GSI WITH {"defer_build":true}
CREATE PRIMARY INDEX def_sample_landmark_primary ON `@BUCKET_NAME@`.sample.landmark USING GSI WITH {"defer_build":true}
CREATE PRIMARY INDEX def_sample_hotel_primary ON `@BUCKET_NAME@`.sample.hotel USING GSI WITH {"defer_build":true}
CREATE PRIMARY INDEX def_sample_airline_primary ON `@BUCKET_NAME@`.sample.airline USING GSI WITH {"defer_build":true}
CREATE PRIMARY INDEX def_sample_route_primary ON `@BUCKET_NAME@`.sample.route USING GSI WITH {"defer_build":true}
CREATE PRIMARY INDEX def_primary on `@BUCKET_NAME@` USING GSI WITH {"defer_build":true}
BUILD INDEX ON `@BUCKET_NAME@`.`sample`.`airline`((SELECT RAW name FROM system:indexes WHERE keyspace_id = 'airline' AND state = 'deferred'))
BUILD INDEX ON `@BUCKET_NAME@`.`sample`.`airport`((SELECT RAW name FROM system:indexes WHERE keyspace_id = 'airport' AND state = 'deferred'))
BUILD INDEX ON `@BUCKET_NAME@`.`sample`.`hotel`((SELECT RAW name FROM system:indexes WHERE keyspace_id = 'hotel' AND state = 'deferred'))
BUILD INDEX ON `@BUCKET_NAME@`.`sample`.`landmark`((SELECT RAW name FROM system:indexes WHERE keyspace_id = 'landmark' AND state = 'deferred'))
BUILD INDEX ON `@BUCKET_NAME@`.`sample`.`route`((SELECT RAW name FROM system:indexes WHERE keyspace_id = 'route' AND state = 'deferred'))
BUILD INDEX ON `@BUCKET_NAME@`((SELECT RAW name FROM system:indexes WHERE keyspace_id = '@BUCKET_NAME@' AND state = 'deferred'))
